Text:
Is there a way to install to another folder instead of c:pr..ubisoftS5???

what will i need to do if i install to another folder eg.. H:Ubi...Sill 5?? to get this wrkin

The reason I said in the instructions to install to default folder, was to avoid POSSIBLE future problems with mods, because they assume a default directory, but of course you can install into a different folder, go ahead......
Sounds great downloading now and will seed
